text:
e="preserve">Cornelius Wilhelmus "Corra" Dirksen (22 January 1938 – 10 July 2020) was a South African rugby player. He won 10 caps and scored three tries. He was born in Vereeniging, Union of South Africa. Dirksen made his international debut against Australia in 1963.
He died from COVID-19 on 10 July 2020 in Krugersdorp, South Africa at the age of 82.
